subject: JWebUnit Problem of Java.net.Connect error peer to peer connection problem
msgSnippet: Hi friends I have prepared a program to test the webpages. The code snippet is as below mport net.sourceforge.jwebunit.WebTestCase; public class ViewInfoTest1
messageBody:
Hi friends
I have prepared a program to test the webpages.
The code snippet is as below
mport net.sourceforge.jwebunit.WebTestCase;
public class ViewInfoTest1 extends WebTestCase {
public ViewInfoTest1(String name) {
super(name);
}
public void setUp() {

getTestContext().setBaseUrl("http://www.google.com");

}
public void testSearch() {
beginAt("/test/First");
setFormElement("q", "httpunit");
submit("btnG");
clickLinkWithText("HttpUnit");
assertTitleEquals("HttpUnit");
assertLinkPresentWithText("User's Manual");
}
}
....
....
So on.
The code works fine for the setBaseUrl("http://localhost:8080/");
But for the above problem or the cases where the port is unknown it is displaying an error like Java. Net.Connect exception or socket error or null pointer exception.
Peer to peer connection error etc.
I tried a lot but it doesnot work.
Can any body help??????????/
Manoj Dubey
